title: Tile, late 18th century
description: Horizontal rectangle. Standing male, civilian costume with swoard. Amrs up-raised, palms outward, in one hand a three-cornered hat. At right, three cedar trees in blue and green cast brown and blue-gray shadows.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tile, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Lead glazed earthenware. Gift of Edith Wetmore. 1936-43-5.
